      • KripkeModel

        public KripkeModel(KripkeModel other)
        Deep copy (except for sdMap) of the KripkeModel. To save memory some sharing magic might be useful. But maybe we can do without. At least for the first version.

        Parameters:

        agents - The agents to take into account

      • getReachableStates

                                                           java.lang.Integer agent)
        Builds the set of states that `agent` can distinguish from `state`
        Parameters:
        state - The state to see if they are different
        agent - The agent to look for differences

      • getReachableStatesForAll

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getReachableStatesForAll(java.lang.Integer state,
                                                                 java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> agents)
        Get the set of states that are reachable in one step from `state` for all agents in `agents`.
        Parameters:
        state - The state to get the reachable states from
        agents - The agents that must all be able to reach that world
        Returns:
        The set of states that all agents can reach from the state
